title: Grateful in All Things
verse_text: Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
encouragement_intro: This reminds me that grateful in all things is possible today through God’s presence.
point1: 💫 I DECLARE today I will walk in GRATEFUL IN ALL THINGS.
point2: 💫 I REFUSE to let anything steal God’s GRATEFUL IN ALL THINGS from my life.
point3: 💫 I WILL live and speak GRATEFUL IN ALL THINGS boldly as my testimony.
closing: 🔥 I WILL rise and carry GRATEFUL IN ALL THINGS with power and conviction today!
prayer: Lord, thank You for Your Word in 1 Thessalonians 5:18. Help me walk in grateful in all things today.
